%1$s Music is family owned and operated and has been in business since 1931. After all these years, we are still passionate about helping others make music. Whether you\'re picking up the guitar for the very first time or a first-chair virtuoso, %1$s Music gives musicians the tools they need to pursue their passion. Our educational services representatives work with local school districts to help support and grow their music programs, offering free instrument pickup and delivery from schools all over the state of Washington and providing complimentary services at many school music events.
